resources.string: Say \"Hello Vuzix\" or click "Listen" then read any button
Voice SDK only runs on Vuzix M300 version 1.2.2 or higher
Please upgrade the M300 to get all features

1- Say \"Hello Vuzix\"(View-zix) until the text of the button changes\n 2- Select a company by saying the number on its left. The text on top of the list will change\n 3- Say \"Next\" to go to the login screen
1- Select a Warehouse by saying the number on its left. The text on top of the list will change\n 2- Say \"Next\" to go to the zone screen
